subject: Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Red Wings will have salary-cap space next season, and will have to decide about free agents like Nicklas Lidstrom, Brendan Shanahan and Chris Chelios.
snippet: The Red Wings will have salary-cap space next season, and will have to decide about free agents like Nicklas Lidstrom, Brendan Shanahan and Chris Chelios.
